page.title: 17Education.
page.content: Howard School. This school is a secondary school situated in Twelve Acres,Welwyn Garden City.At the end of this school year it will merge with Heronswood School.The new school will be on Howard's site and renamed Sir John Newsom.The school pupils are aged between 11 and 18.The school has many sporting facilities such as a swimming pool,gymnasium and tennis courts. Our Lady's School. Our Lady's is a Roman Catholic Junior school,situated in Woodhall Lane.The pupils are aged between 5 and 11.The school is divided into two sections, infant and junior and has a small hall and dining room.A hut in the playground is used by scouts for a meeting hall each week.
